amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $300 million in funding for the SEC thereby bringing the level up to the President's request of $1.7 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for salaries and expenses of the SEC by $300 million and to reduce the amount available in the proviso regarding offsetting collections by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 235 (Roll no. 412).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 235 (Roll no. 412).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Ms. Waters.
